name: DNO
description:
Get to the bottom so you can get to the bottom. Or as the locals say: dno.
Be safe!

Explore dark corners of mysterious caves with your ladders.

Ludum Dare 48 JAM game

Controls:
WSAD / arrows — movement
space / ctrl — jump
left mouse button — action (press, hold & release)
esc — menu

Warning: There is an end, but no ending.
